updates.text: Trains on the NSEW line are running at slower speeds. Free bus services are still available until further notice.
Trains on the NSEW line are currently running at slower speeds. Free bus services are still available until further notice.
Train service on NS Line has resumed. Free boarding of buses still available.
Service on the North South line has resumed at reduced speeds. Free bus services will continue until further notice.
Service on NS line is still unavailable. Service on EW line is running at slower speeds. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Service on the North South line is still unavailable. Free bus services is still available at all NSEW stations.
Train service on EW Line has resumed. Free boarding of buses are still available.
Service on EW line has resumed at slower speeds. Service on North South line is still unavailable. We are working to rectify the problem.
We are still investigating the cause of the power fault and are doing our best to restore service on the North South lines.
Services on the EW line from Pasir Ris to Joo Koon have resumed. We are proceeding with caution and trains are moving at a slower speed.
NSEW Lines down. Take the NEL, Downtwn or Circle Line or other tpt mode to continue your journey.
We are concurrently running tests on the North South line to systematically isolate the source of the power fault and rectify the problem.
Our trains have completed tests on the EWL from Pasir Ris to Joo Koon MRT stations. We are working towards resuming services on EWL.
No train service on NSEW lines. Commuters are advised to take the free bus services or other train lines such as the Circle or NEL.
No train service at all NSEWL stations. Free boarding of passing by buses available.
Commuters are advised to avoid the NSEWL as we rectify the power fault. Pls take the free bus services or other train lines.
Train service is not available on the North-South and East-West Lines (NSEWL). Free bus services are available at all NSEWL MRT stations.
Due to traction power fault, please expect additional 20mins traveling time between CLE and JKN and between MRB and YIS both bounds.
